scripts.link:create-utils: cd packages/gluestack-utils && yarn && yarn clean && yarn build && yalc publish
scripts.link:create-core: cd packages/gluestack-core && yarn && yarn clean && yarn build && yalc publish
scripts.link:apps-website: cd apps/website && yalc link @gluestack-ui-nightly/utils && yalc link @gluestack-ui-nightly/core
scripts.link:apps-kitchen-sink: cd apps/kitchen-sink && yalc link @gluestack-ui-nightly/utils && yalc link @gluestack-ui-nightly/core
scripts.unlink:apps-website: cd apps/website && yalc remove @gluestack-ui-nightly/utils && yalc remove @gluestack-ui-nightly/core && rm -rf node_modules/@gluestack-ui-nightly && rm -rf .yalc
scripts.unlink:apps-kitchen-sink: cd apps/kitchen-sink && yalc remove @gluestack-ui-nightly/utils && yalc remove @gluestack-ui-nightly/core && rm -rf node_modules/@gluestack-ui-nightly && rm -rf .yalc
